ej,cox-b103,M,gormb901,Batter interference call on throw to 1B $Yunel Escobar hit a liner off Bronson Arroyo's back; Arroyo picked up the ball near the 1B line and threw to 1B; the throw hit Escobar on the shoulder as he reached the bag and he was called out for interfering with the play; Escobar turned his ankle when he stepped on the bag; Braves manager Bobby Cox was ejected by HP umpire Brian Gorman for arguing the call
Braves shortstop Yunel Escobar left the game due to an injured ankle
